normalized: three days had passed, during which time i had continued to be driven by unease.
this day had finally arrived.
it was the day to carry out the force infiltration of the washizu material co.
research facility.
if we could get our hands on information here, we could bid farewell to the disgusting place known as seishuu academy.
my relationship with yukikaze, which had become strained for some reason, would undoubtedly also be like it was before.
while waiting on standby at the agreed-upon rendezvous point, i was checking my equipment, making sure i wasn't careless in my preparations.

name: shizuru
normalized: tatsurou-kun.
good evening.
as her name suggested, shizuru-san appeared without making any footstep sounds.
(tl: shizuru's name contains 静, meaning quiet.
of course, she was not in the suit that i had gotten used to seeing lately.
it was a taimanin outfit, like me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hi, shizuru-san.
even the moon's not out, so today's a good day for the infiltration, isn't it?

name: shizuru
normalized: indeed.
it was worth waiting carefully.
while making idle chatter, shizuru-san peered at my face.

name: shizuru
normalized: you look sleep-deprived, though.
are you all right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'm fine… ha ha.
i replied as cheerfully as i could to shizuru-san, who spoke to me like she was concerned.
speaking honestly, i hadn't been able to sleep much these past three days.
『our y buta-chan's lady diary』
because no matter what i did, the site on morita's business card had been on my mind.
surely not yukikaze?
no, that couldn't be!
but, perhaps…?
stop.
don't think about it.
but――
while arguing with myself like that repeatedly, i had decided to try browsing it many times, but in the end, i couldn't.
because i was scared.
if yukikaze were having more horrible things than that sexual harassment done to her for the sake of the mission.
if that were being uploaded on morita's site or wherever.
what would i do?
as a fellow taimanin, would i have to forgive that?
would i have to recognize that it was for the sake of the mission, and accept it all?
or, would it be better to act like i didn't know anything?
was i capable of something like that?
when i had seen yukikaze being the plaything of morita and the other boys, it had felt like my guts were boiling.
did yukikaze not care about my feelings?
was i immature as a taimanin for thinking that way?
no, were those sorts of things being done to her during the mission up until now, and i just didn't know about them?
i would hate that.
i didn't even want to think about something like that.
yukikaze was mine alone.
i didn't want to hand her over to anybody.
suspicion, jealousy, anger and impatience had kept swirling around and bothering me the whole time up to today, and no answer had emerged.

name: shizuru
normalized: ――tatsurou-kun, tatsurou-kun!

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
uh, what is it?
with my name being called by shizuru-san, i suddenly raised my face.

name: shizuru
normalized: honestly, shape up!

name: tatsurou
normalized: y, yes.
being firmly slapped on the shoulder, i focused my mind, which had been turning that over again before i knew it.

name: shizuru
normalized: anyway, it's almost time, but…
shizuru-san had looked at her watch quizzically.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?
i also checked the time for myself.
it was true.
even though we were almost at the meeting time, yukikaze still hadn't arrived.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （did something happen?
5 minutes, 10 minutes… and then, the appointed time passed by.
yukikaze didn't appear at all.

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san!
i became unable to stay silent, and strengthened my voice a little.

name: shizuru
normalized: indeed.
this is odd, isn't it?
shizuru-san nodded.
it was certainly strange for yukikaze to be late, much less late to play the main part in a force infiltration.
armed guards were patrolling the forest where we were hiding now, which amounted to a boundary wall for the research facility.
it wasn't time for their patrol right now.
i didn't think that yukikaze would be discovered by guards like those, but some unexpected trouble might have occurred.
it was also fully conceivable that she had been attacked by that perverted rubber woman, whom i, shizuru-san and yukikaze had all encountered once.
we had investigated a lot while we were hiding out, and had even sought help from the village, but that person's true identity was still a mystery.
we didn't know why she had appeared to meet us and then disappeared with perfect timing, on the day when we first entered the research facility, and the day when yukikaze had moved in.
however, even though we didn't know, i was apprehensive that she might come out again tonight.

name: shizuru
normalized: i have no choice but to go look for her, huh?

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'll go too.
i was about to start moving, unable to contain myself, when shizuru-san grabbed hold of my arm.

name: shizuru
normalized: wait.
it's not like we've determined that something did happen to mizuki-san yet.

name: shizuru
normalized: i'll need backup for the eventuality that she and i miss each other.
you wait here.

name: tatsurou
normalized: but, what if she's been attacked by that rubber woman, or something?

name: shizuru
normalized: i understand that you're worried about mizuki-san, but calm down.
there's no sign of a battle around.
your ears are better than mine, so you've already realized that, haven't you?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah, that's true, but…

i had certainly been probing around with my wind for a while, but i couldn't hear the sounds of anybody fighting, or intense footstep sounds, or the strange noise that accompanied ninja arts, from anywhere.

name: shizuru
normalized: besides, in the unlikely event that mizuki-san has already been hurt by the rubber woman, we'll need to consider immediate withdrawal.
you understand, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: …yes.
i nodded.
what shizuru-san said was natural.

name: shizuru
normalized: i'll come back in 30 minutes.
if mizuki-san arrives before that, or i accompany her, we'll carry out the force infiltration as planned.

name: tatsurou
normalized: and if neither of you come back?

name: shizuru
normalized: i don't want to think about that too much, but assume that mizuki-san and i have been defeated by the rubber woman, and withdraw.
this is an order.

name: tatsurou
normalized: …i understand.
be careful.

name: shizuru
normalized: it's all right.
she's only a little late.
shizuru-san smiled slightly in order to make me relieved, and quietly disappeared into the night.
i was left standing there alone.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （yukikaze… are you okay…?
i was waiting impatiently, and after about 10 minutes,

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze!
yukikaze simply showed up with shizuru-san.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah, tatsurou.
sorry, sorry.
were you waiting?

name: tatsurou
normalized: why are you late?!
my manner of speaking unintentionally became firmer due to her nonchalant entrance, which didn't care at all about my feelings.
yukikaze puffed out her cheeks a little, but still spoke pretty much like she was making an excuse.

name: yukikaze
normalized: don't yell all of a sudden like that.
i had a hard time.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what hard time?
if you're going to be late, give me a call.
today's the key part of the force infiltration.
what were you thinking, being late for that?
are you an idiot?!

name: yukikaze
normalized: wh, what do you mean, idiot?
you don't have to go that far just 'cause i was a little late, you know!
why are you being so stuck-up?!

name: shizuru
normalized: okay, okay.
don't fight right after meeting again after so long.

name: yukikaze ＆ tatsurou
normalized: but shizuru-san, tatsurou's――」「but shizuru-san, yukikaze's――
we accidentally harmonized our voices, and looked at each other in surprise.
shizuru-san made a wry smile as she calmed us down.

name: shizuru
normalized: tatsurou-kun, it appears that mizuki-san had a hard time getting away from inui-san.
she said she was late because of that.

name: tatsurou
normalized: huh?
what was that?
i tilted my head to the side, and yukikaze spoke to me in a tone that was dripping with displeasure.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it took time to make inui go away.
even though i told him, 『you can go home now,』 that man is persistent.
i couldn't help but be at least a little late, could i?

name: shizuru
normalized: well, on top of being serious, he's enthusiastic, so that is unavoidable.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's right!
tatsurou's really inconsiderate, suddenly saying stuff like 『why are you late, you idiot?
』 without even knowing about these scholarship student problems.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what's with that way of talking?
think about how worried i was!

name: yukikaze
normalized: i didn't especially ask for you to worry about me!

name: tatsurou
normalized: what did you say?!

name: yukikaze
normalized: what?!

name: shizuru
normalized: okay, stop it, stop it!
gochin!
gochin!

name: yukikaze ＆ tatsurou
normalized: augh!
」「ow!
yukikaze and i were both dealt a fist by shizuru-san.

name: shizuru
normalized: both of you!
we don't have time for you to be messing around.
and mizuki-san, no matter what kind of reason you had, you're the one who was late, so feel sorry about it.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah… uuh… yes…
yukikaze ducked her head back due to shizuru-san's fair reasoning.

name: shizuru
normalized: apologize to tatsurou-kun too, all right?
after all, it seems he's been worrying about you all the time lately.

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh…?
yukikaze looked at me like she was taken aback.
she had awfully pained-looking eyes.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …is that true?

name: tatsurou
normalized: i, i guess… i figured you'd been attacked by that rubber woman tonight as well, or something.
i did think that since it's yukikaze, you'd be all right, though.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i see… sorry for making you worry.

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, it looks like it was nothing, so it's fine.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …yeah, it was nothing.

name: shizuru
normalized: now, you were late to arrive, but naturally, you're fully prepared, right mizuki-san?
shizuru-san asked, as if to make us put our feelings behind us and move on, whereupon yukikaze made a sudden smile.

name: yukikaze
normalized: 'course.
cyborg spider or perverted rubber woman, come anytime, anywhere!

name: shizuru
normalized: fufu, aren't you confident.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i did come here for that, after all!
they were both in a pretty good mood.
from my perspective, i thought that yukikaze disliked shizuru-san considerably, but it seemed that they had started getting along at some point.
and that argument just now.
this really was the yukikaze i knew.
my mental anguish over these last three days seemed like it was all nothing but needless worry.
somehow, it started to feel like all my worries had been resolved at once.
no, was there really a need to worry in the first place?
perhaps even being sexually harassed by the male students was some kind of plan after all…
shizuru-san having forbidden me from contact with yukikaze was also for the sake of the mission…
morita aside, maybe there was a student among her classmates that she had to keep an eye on.
perhaps there was a key figure she had to get close to by acting a little seductively, or something…
right.
that was it for sure…

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's definitely it!

name: yukikaze
normalized: what is?
yukikaze stared blankly at me, after i had suddenly raised my voice.

name: shizuru
normalized: you've been strange recently, tatsurou-kun.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's usual.
even that bad-mouthing was the same as always.
it was yukikaze.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hahaha… nothing…
i became a little happy, and glossed over what i said with a smile.
okay, it was on.
the force infiltration.
this was the crucial moment.
